title: Liam Hemsworth's new flame 'wanted sex with him and brother Chris at same time'
text:

Liam Hemsworth's new beau Maddison Brown, once admitted that she would like to bed both Liam and brother Chris - at the same time.

The Dynasty actress revealed during the summer that she fancied the Hemsworths, at a time when Liam was still married to Miley Cyrus and there was no hint at the break up about to happen.

The 22-year-old actress was pictured holding hands with Liam, 29, in his first post-break up photos with another woman and they are packed with PDA action.

It would seem that it could be that Maddison's plan is working a treat, as she looks to have bagged her first Hemsworth.

(Image: X90045)

Back in June, Maddison took part in a game of "F***, Marry, Kill" with her Dynasty co-star Elizabeth Gillies on Hollywood radio show, the Zach Sang Show.

Maddison was given the options of Hugh Jackman, Margot Robbie and the Hemsworth brothers and it was Jackman that was given the chop.

She chose to 'marry' Margot, as Maddison said she would like to "f*** her for life," before turning her attentions to Liam and his 36-year-old brother, Chris.

(Image: maddisonbrown/Instagram)

(Image: AFP/Getty Images)

She continued: "And then I’d like to f*** the Hemsworth brothers, but at the same time. Both of them.

"I couldn’t marry them, I’m too insecure. I’d be like, ‘You’re too attractive, you’re never allowed to leave the house.'"

After her date with Liam, this insecurity may have ebbed away, as she becomes the first person to be romantically linked to Liam since his split from Miley.
